Package thirdparty.fr.inria.optimization.cmaes.fitness

Class AbstractObjectiveFunction

java.lang.Object
thirdparty.fr.inria.optimization.cmaes.fitness.AbstractObjectiveFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjectiveFunction, IObjectiveFunctionParallel
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ackley, Cigar, CigTab, DiffPow, Elli, ElliRotated, FunctionCollector, RandFun, Rastrigin, Rosen, Sphere, ssDiffPow, Tablet, TwoAxes
public abstract class AbstractObjectiveFunction extends Object implements IObjectiveFunction, IObjectiveFunctionParallel
extending from this abstract class implements a generic isFeasible method and adds the IObjectiveFunctionParallel interface to a class that implements the interface IObjectiveFunction see CMAEvolutionStrategy.java for copyright.
